name: Blush
description: Sweet and subtle, this pastel outfit gives you a natural, warm glow. Perfect for adding a soft, charming touch to your look!

name: Butler
description: Embrace the classic butler style with a monocle, top hat, and a distinguished mustache. Perfect for serving with charm and elegance in the kitchen!

name: Witch Costume
description: Cast culinary spells in this magical outfit, complete with a starry hat and robe!

name: Cat Outfit
description: Purrfection in the kitchen! This adorable feline getup includes ears and a fluffy tail.

name: Panda Outfit
description: Slow, steady, and sweet! Cook up cute chaos with panda flair.

name: Devil Costume
description: Add a pinch of mischief to your dishes with this fiery outfit.

name: Pig Costume
description: Get your oink on and whip up a feast in this farmyard favorite!

name: Bow Tie
description: Class up your culinary chaos with this dashing bow tie.

name: Daisy Accessory
description: Bright and breezy, bring floral charm to your foodie fashion.

name: String Bow
description: A cute little string bow tie that adds charm to your companion.

name: Angry
description: An expressive angry icon that shows your companion means business.
